name: The stolen pencils and the lost colors
name_original: The stolen pencils and the lost colors
description:
A four members project made at the end of my first year at e-artsup.

You just arrived at a new kingdom and you're wrongly accused of the robbery of some ancient artifacts. Without them, the kingdom become duller day after day. To save this world, and prove your innocence, you decide to go on a journey to give find them and give them back to the kingdom.

Team members :

Axelle DESQUILBET

Victor MAUROY

Mathilde SCHMITT

Elseline COUTURE
